DOC.brief_summary: In patient undergo elective coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) surgery , coronary artery disease , sleep-disordered breathing ( SDB ) , atrial fibrillation ( AF ) perioperative atrial fibrillation complication assess . The primary objective determine , whether SDB patient higher rate Major Adverse Cardiac Cerebrovascular Events ( MACCE ) within 30 day surgery compare without SDB .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Sleep-disordered Breathing Atrial Fibrillation Perioperative Complications Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective CABG surgery Department Cardiac Thoracic Surgery , University Hospital Regensburg . Written inform consent Preoperative use inotropes intra aortic balloon pump Severe obstructive pulmonary disease Patients oxygen therapy , nocturnal positive airway pressure support mechanical ventilation
